description: This file defines a Dart class 'NotesDb' which manages local SQLite database operations for a note-taking app. It includes methods for initializing the database, fetching, inserting, updating, and deleting notes, as well as closing the database connection.

classes.name: NotesDb
classes.description: A singleton service class that manages local SQLite database operations for notes.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the database, creating necessary tables and indexes if not already initialized.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the database, optionally filtering by a search query.

methods.name: insertNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns its row ID.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID.
